item.title: Dev Workflow for Custom Resources
item.description: AWS CloudFormation allows users to declare what resources are required in a project. When using CloudFormation, a developer’s responsibility is to describe what he wants while letting the service figure out how to get there. He uses the JSON/YAML schema for resource specification, submits it for stack creation, and lets it handle the management of the lifecycle events in the infrastructure (e.
